title: Souvenir Map, American Institute of Graphic Arts (AIGA): M&Co House [Studio] Tour Map and Guide, 1987
title_raw: American Institute of Graphic Arts (AIGA): M&Co House [Studio] Tour Map and Guide
dimensions:
28 x 10.7 cm (11 x 4 1/4 in.), closed
28 x 43 cm (11 x 17 in.), opened
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & Co.
description:
This hand drawn and hand-labeled diagram of the M&Co offices located on West 57th Street, reproduced on the recto of an accordion-folded sheet of paper, was distributed to visitors on the occasion of a studio tour on May 20, 1987.  Perhaps the layout shown in the present object has some relationship to actual M&Co premises; however, the humorous labeling - for example, in Portfolio Green Room w/ Pathetic Rietveld Knock-Off; Proposed M&Co Gift and Souvenir Gift Shop - is entirely fictitious. 

With the object folded, the front page, imprinted in a typewriter font, reads 
5 c [ents] (just below the top edge)/ Souvenir (further down, but within the top half)/ M&Co/ Map and Guide)/ AIGA House Tour (close to the bottom edge)/ May 20, 1987.

tombstone.epitaph:
Souvenir Map, American Institute of Graphic Arts (AIGA): M&Co House [Studio] Tour Map and Guide, 1987. Offset lithography. 
Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & Co.. 1993-151-385
